meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excessively sensitive or easily offended.
meanings.sent1: Her oversensitivenesses made it difficult for her to handle even the smallest criticism.
meanings.sent2: His oversensitivenesses often led to misunderstandings with his friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite his oversensitivenesses, he tried to see the humor in everyday situations.
meanings.sent4: The oversensitivenesses of the situation were like a fragile glass, easily shattered.
meanings.sent5: The oversensitivenesses of the child's feelings were evident in every tear shed.

meanings.definition: The tendency to react strongly to minor stimuli or criticism.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with oversensitivenesses can be challenging in a group setting.
meanings.sent2: His oversensitivenesses caused him to overreact to even the smallest comments.
meanings.sent3: The oversensitivenesses of the cat to the sound of a can opening always made the family laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her oversensitivenesses were like a storm brewing in a teacup.
meanings.sent5: The oversensitivenesses of the alarm system made it go off at the slightest touch.
